starting_word: We are a company specialized in providing technical and legal services where we seek to provide a multi-choice environment towards confronting the phenomenon of extortion and electronic threat, and to protect those exposed to it and deter those who practice it through specialized technicians and licensed lawyers.We aim to deal with cases of extortion and electronic threat and deal with them very quickly and confidentially and care of the client until it reaches safety.When you are subjected to extortion or electronic threats, whether from outside Saudi Arabia, from Morocco, or from within Saudi Arabia or from any other country, we urge you to contact a team immediately to seek help in the fight against electronic extortion that you are located and eliminate it once and for all to resolve your problem and return Security is fast and confidential
